mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (recipe_id, user_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{recipeId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, recipe_id, user_id, content, created_at FROM comments WHERE recipe_id = #{recipeId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, recipe_id, user_id, content, created_at FROM comments WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, recipe_id, user_id, content, created_at FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, recipe_id, user_id, content, created_at FROM comments
